page.title: XML Transaction Service Demonstration Application: Introduction
page.header: XML Transaction Service Demonstration Application: Introduction

html.p: Welcome to the "Night Out" sample application for the XML Transaction component of JBossTS 4.2.2.
This documentation will help you get started with using the JBossTS Web services transactioning product.

This trail map is structured as follows:
Installation Content: Details the components which have been installed.
About the Sample Application: An explanatory overview of the sample application.
Deploying the Sample Application: Shows how to deploy and run the sample.
Atomic Transactions: Overview and example for short lived ACID transactions style.
Business Activities: Extended transactions for long running business processes.
Source code: How the sample application is structured and built.
Where Next?: Further reading and suggested next steps.
Use the links in the panel on the left to navigate the documentation. On the following pages, click the 'Home' link to return to this page.
